     return torch.pairwise_distance(x1, x2, p, eps, keepdim)
 
 
+pdist = _add_docstr(torch.pdist, r"""

+
+Computes the p-norm distance between every pair of row vectors in the input.
body: Good question!  I think in this case it is justified because the function has the exact same name and we are talking about parameter names, which would have to change in a backwards-incompatible way for our docs to be invalid.
